name: Battlefall: State of Conflict
description:
Battlefall: State of Conflict is a Real-Time Strategy - 5 years in the making that honours the classics from the early 2000's. 

Take control of your army with the freedom to expand your base however you want, populate your forces with infantry/vehicles which specialize in specific tactics, outwit your opponent and claim victory.

CAMPAIGN:

Battlefall: State of Conflict will feature FOUR highly polished campaign sets. One for each faction with an extra campaign that utilizes and takes advantage of what the game can truely do.

SKIRMISH:

Make your own rules! Choose a map from the pool and battle it out however you wish -- choose your faction, decide the teams, pick your starting location. In skirmish, it's a fight to the death!

Want something more random? Go-to the 'Random Map' settings on the skirmish page and generate your own map to your specifications

EDITOR:

Feeling creative? Make whatever you want!

Whether it be a skirmish map, a single-player campaign map, a co-op campaign map, a tower-defence map or something that completely breaks the rules, the power is in your hands. Paint grassy fields, raise cliffs, create scripts or triggers, whatever your imagination can reach -- and then share your creations across the Steam Workshop ( coming soon )

RULE EDITOR:

Sick of that tank shooting two rounds at a time? Want your infantry to fire nukes at your enemies? Reckon your advance defence tower should cost $1?

Well that's where the rule editor comes into it. You have the power to create your own unique faction -- decide what your structures look like, how much they cost, how much HP they have, what they do. Same goes for infantry and vehicles.

Design your own weapons to the absolute smallest detail. Design their warhead, their damage their effectiveness, etc... then attach that weapon to YOUR unit.

There is absolutely no limit when it comes to expressing your creativity with these two editors. Go nuts!

ENJOY!
